description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Sorry, All explanation and conversation in this game are written in Japanese.  This is a story of a boy who had got to get back a princess kidnapped in the course of things. You can get a weapon or enchantment at every stage you cleared. Go with your three weapons and three enchantments! Please read this web page for how to play. http://www.winglay.com/heppokokisi/english.html
